name: GRAVEYARD ESCAPE
description:
My Entry to the 2022 GameDev.TV Game Jam! The theme for the game jam is "DEATH IS ONLY THE BEGINNING." 


GRAVEYARD ESCAPE
Take the role of a zombie who is trying to sneak out of a graveyard. Use your stealth skills to avoid detection from the guard and make it to the exit!


~~~~~~~~~

This project was created in UNREAL ENGINE 5 by Telesphoros GAMES as an entry to the 2022 GameDev.TV Game Jam. The project files are available for eligibility validation and educational purposes. This project is NOT to be used for monetary gain in any way. 

Assets used to create this game :

-The opening menu music and win screen music is by https://Nihilore.com/ - Free CCO music for indie game developers. 

-The Logo was created for free at Kapwing.com. 

-The Environment Assets and "Graveyard Guard" are composed of free assets from Epic Games' Unreal Marketplace:

- The Paragon Sevarog pack.

- The Soul Cave pack.

- The City of Brass : Environments pack.

-The Zombie character and animations are free to use from Mixamo.com.

-The game sound effects are free downloads from https://kronbits.itch.io/freesfx.

-The in-game music was a personal creation. 

Many thanks to the folks at GameDev.Tv for making this game a possibility. I have been creating video games for less than a year, but I fell in love with C++ video game creation after taking the Unreal Engine C++ course that GameDev.tv created.

Cheers and blessings,

Tele
